original_text: A greedy leech has two daughters. They are always saying, ‘Give me more!’ 30: A leech is a little animal that drinks blood. There are three things that never have enough for themselves, even four things: A greedy leech has two daughters. They are always saying, ‘Give me more!’ 30: A leech is a little animal that drinks blood. There are three things that never have enough for themselves, even four things: A greedy leech has two daughters. They are always saying, ‘Give me more!’ 30: A leech is a little animal that drinks blood. There are three things that never have enough for themselves, even four things: A greedy leech has two daughters. They are always saying, ‘Give me more!’
korean_text: 거머리에게는 두 딸이 있어 다오 다오 하느니라 족한 줄을 알지 못하여 족하다 하지 아니하는 것 서넛이 있나니

sentences.original_text: A greedy leech has two daughters.
sentences.korean_translation: 욕심 많은 거머리에게 딸이 둘 있다.

sentences.original_text: A leech is a little animal
that never have enough for themselves,
